targets.expr:
(count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", job="$job", alertname=~"^Z[ADP]\\w+"}) or on() vector(0))
+ (count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", job="$job", fstype="zfs"}) or on() vector(0))

count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", job="$job", alertname=~"^ZPool.+"}) by (alertname, severity)
or
count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", job="$job", fstype="zfs"}) by (alertname, severity)
